revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Meta: add Corpus dei papiri filosofici (CPF) 2.3 p. 331-334, no. 47, and Cribiore, Writing, teachers, and students, no. 135, to the biblio; change 'sheet' to 'tablet' in the book form. L. 1: change <:σαυτὸν|reg|σεαυτὸν:> to <:<:σαυτὸν|reg|σεαυτὸν:>=Zereteli|ed|σεαυτὸν=CPF:>; l. 4: change <:σ’ ὡσεί oder σ’ὥσπερ|reg|σε ὡς:> to <:<:<:σ’ ὡσεί|alt|σ’ ὥσπερ:>|reg|σε ὡς:>=Zereteli|ed|σε ὡς=CPF:>, l. 6, change [...........] to [.11]

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Meta: add Corpus dei papiri filosofici (CPF) 2.3 p. 331-334, no. 47, and Cribiore, Writing, teachers, and students, no. 135, to the biblio; change 'sheet' to 'tablet' in the book form. L. 1: change <:σαυτὸν|reg|σεαυτὸν:> to <:<:σαυτὸν|reg|σεαυτὸν:>=Zereteli|ed|σεαυτὸν=CPF:>; l. 4: change <:σ’ ὡσεί oder σ’ὥσπερ|reg|σε ὡς:> to <:<:<:σ’ ὡσεί|alt|σ’ ὥσπερ:>|reg|σε ὡς:>=Zereteli|ed|σε ὡς=CPF:>, l. 6, change [...........] to [.11]

Submit - Text: We don't have a photo of this papyri, but Zereteli wrote, that he saw the space about 2 cm in hight between 5 and 6 lines. He mentioned the size of letters (approximately 1 cm), so that we can assume that there was a vacant space for one line. Also, in lines 7 and 12 I've made mistakes with linebreaks intentionally (<:υπο- 8. μενιν:>), otherwise *slanting-strokes* stand not in the right place. Meta: I’ve deleted volume in the Biblio record; deleted display name and moved Legacy name to Display name; added dimensions.

Submit - Text: We don't have a photo of this papyri, but Zereteli wrote, that he saw the space about 2 cm in hight between 5 and 6 lines. He mentioned the size of letters (approximately 1 cm), so that we can assume that there was a vacant space for one line. Also, in lines 7 and 12 I've made mistakes with linebreaks intentionally (<:υπο- 8. μενιν:>), otherwise *slanting-strokes* stand not in the right place. Meta: I’ve deleted volume in the Biblio record; deleted display name and moved Legacy name to Display name; added dimensions.
